entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
